original_title: The Jesus Series - Easter: Read and Share DVD Bible
overview: Share the power and beauty of Easter with the children in your life. Animated straight from the pages of the popular Read and Share Bible, The Jesus Series introduces children to the life of Christ in a powerful new trilogy. Departing from the 3-minute, bite-size story format of the Read and Share DVD Bible Volumes 1-4, this story of Easter is an uninterrupted half-hour presentation of Jesusâ€™ last week on earth. With an eye-catching art style, warm narration, and gentle musical underscore, children will experience the Easter story in an engaging new way.
title: The Jesus Series - Easter: Read and Share DVD Bible
